name: Project Balloon
description:
Play as young elephant who can jump and shoot balloon

This game is automatically take a screenshot when you've win.  If you want, lets upload it in the comment section and compare together your win time and death count ;)

P.S. If you're stuck, press ESC to reset

Developer Note :

This game is only a prototype. That's why the game is still not have any asset, because we're still testing the control and the mechanic. And also we're still not sure whether we will take it to production or not, so please give us feedback. Thanks!
